text: Just watched Thunderbolts. Pleasantly surprised. Vault escape was hilarious. Valentina is pure evil. Bob is epic. Bucky was likeable. Yelena and the team were awesome. Loved the unique story and perfect balance of emotion, humour, and action. The ending was weird but cool.  8/10

Initial thoughts on Captain America Brave New World: I liked it overall. Red Hulk was cool and the story was good, but the final fight felt off. Sam Wilson is still human and there's no way he can match a Hulk. The serum debate dragged. Old MCU callbacks didn’t land for me. 7/10
Remember when kids used to egg houses? Now we can't afford the eggs... or the houses.
I'm locked into monthly cloud storage fees just so I can maintain a museum of accidental lock screen screenshots
